title: She Got Me: Deja
description: One night in bed with the birthday boy. That's all it took for Deja's life to be flipped upside down. The night she met Malik ignited a burning desire in her that Deja hadn't even known she was capable of. She could never forget the way his strong hands had held her or the way his lips had electrified her body like a bolt of lightning. Things with Malik seemed like something out of a fairytale, and the more time she spent with him, the more she was willing to give him every part of her.Until the unthinkable happened. Deja finds she's pregnant.How could one night of passion create so much confusion?Now Deja must decide if her craving for Malik is enough to build a relationship on, or if the only thing between them is lust and best to part ways.
author: Just Bae
